item.description: Azure Application Gateway is a web traffic load balancer that enables you to manage traffic to your web applications. It includes features such as SSL/TLS offload, HTTP/HTTPS redirection, and cookie-based affinity. Nginx is an open-source web server that can also be used as a reverse proxy, load balancer, and HTTP cache. When running Nginx on an Azure Virtual Machine (VM), you have the ability to customize the configuration and install additional modules to suit your needs.
